data.text:
『Parcae』 “understands”. It analyzes its input to find a path to 
the right solution. Precise and unwavering, it works toward its 
intended purpose.
data.processed:
<story>『Parcae』 “understands”. It analyzes its input to find a path to 
<story>the right solution. Precise and unwavering, it works toward its 
<story>intended purpose.

data.text:
Given valid input, its solution is absolute. A single, immutable 
answer, a well-defined calculation with no room for guesswork.
data.processed:
<story>Given valid input, its solution is absolute. A single, immutable 
<story>answer, a well-defined calculation with no room for guesswork.

data.text:
Ergo―― 『Parcae』 does not “understand”. 
In the world of zeroes and ones, there is no code for overcoming 
despair.
data.processed:
<story>Ergo―― 『Parcae』 does not “understand”. 
<story>In the world of zeroes and ones, there is no code for overcoming 
<story>despair.

data.text:
That day, I was observing Umamusume who hadn't debuted yet, 
looking for someone to train.
data.processed:
<story>That day, I was observing Umamusume who hadn't debuted yet, 
<story>looking for someone to train.

data.text:
Opera O-san and Top Road-san sure are amazing... 
...I don't know if I can catch up to them, but...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Opera O-san and Top Road-san sure are amazing... 
<story>...I don't know if I can catch up to them, but...!

data.text:
Tracen Academy really lived up to its reputation. 
Every Umamusume I saw was top-class. Lost in my excitement, I 
suddenly noticed beside me――
data.processed:
<story>Tracen Academy really lived up to its reputation. 
<story>Every Umamusume I saw was top-class. Lost in my excitement, I 
<story>suddenly noticed beside me――

data.text:
There was a girl intently watching the Umamusume run, 
occasionally typing something in her laptop.
data.processed:
<story>There was a girl intently watching the Umamusume run, 
<story>occasionally typing something in her laptop.

data.text:
No, she wasn't just watching... Her gaze burned straight through 
it all. As if searching for something beyond the runners, beyond 
her laptop's screen――
data.processed:
<story>No, she wasn't just watching... Her gaze burned straight through 
<story>it all. As if searching for something beyond the runners, beyond 
<story>her laptop's screen――

data.text: ...Tch!
data.processed: <story>...Tch!

choices.text: (It was pretty rude of me to stare...)

data.text:
Hey, you see that just now? Air Shakur-senpai's as scary as they 
say, glaring at an adult like that.
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed:
<story>Hey, you see that just now? Air Shakur-senpai's as scary as they 
<story>say, glaring at an adult like that.

data.text:
But, she's like, smart, right? Not too long ago a teacher was 
complaining, like, “she's intelligent and great at running, but that 
attitude...”
data.name: Umamusume B
data.processed:
<story>But, she's like, smart, right? Not too long ago a teacher was 
<story>complaining, like, “she's intelligent and great at running, but that 
<story>attitude...”

data.text:
She pretty much only ever barely makes curfew. Guess you'd call 
a delinquent, or something? She always looks so ticked off, too... 
Wonder what goes on in her head.
data.name: Umamusume B
data.processed:
<story>She pretty much only ever barely makes curfew. Guess you'd call 
<story>a delinquent, or something? She always looks so ticked off, too... 
<story>Wonder what goes on in her head.

data.text:
Air Shakur―― it seemed like the other girls were afraid of her. 
That unique personality, especially that focus in her eyes, made 
her hard to forget.
data.processed:
<story>Air Shakur―― it seemed like the other girls were afraid of her. 
<story>That unique personality, especially that focus in her eyes, made 
<story>her hard to forget.

data.text: Look, man, I've been saying, I'm not up to anything...
data.processed: <story>Look, man, I've been saying, I'm not up to anything...

data.text:
That night, on my way back to school grounds... 
I saw an Umamusume being held up by the police.

choices.text: (Those ears... Is that who I think it is?)
choices.processed: <size=42>(Those ears... Is that who I think it is?)</size>

data.processed:
<story>That night, on my way back to school grounds... 
<story>I saw an Umamusume being held up by the police.

data.text:
You're stubborn as hell, doing this every time.
'Sides, it's still too early to take me in for- ...Oh.
data.processed:
<story>You're stubborn as hell, doing this every time.
<story>'Sides, it's still too early to take me in for- ...Oh.

data.text: Hmm? Do you know her?
data.name: Policeman
data.processed: <story>Hmm? Do you know her?

data.text:
Thank goodness, you're with the school... 
I should let you know, too. She's been loitering around way too 
late recently...
data.name: Policeman
data.processed:
<story>Thank goodness, you're with the school... 
<story>I should let you know, too. She's been loitering around way too 
<story>late recently...

data.text:
“Let you know”? Give me a break.
Prolly just think I'm up to no good.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>“Let you know”? Give me a break.
<story>Prolly just think I'm up to no good.

data.text:
It's not that! What if something happens to you while you're 
holed up in that net cafe? I'm just concerned for your safety, 
why don't you get that?!
data.name: Policeman
data.processed:
<story>It's not that! What if something happens to you while you're 
<story>holed up in that net cafe? I'm just concerned for your safety, 
<story>why don't you get that?!

data.text:
It looked like they were just going to keep talking past each 
other, so...

choices.text: I told her to wait for me.
I told her to wait for me.

data.processed:
<story>It looked like they were just going to keep talking past each 
<story>other, so...

data.text: Huh?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Huh?

data.text:
...Then it's fine. Though you shouldn't leave a minor alone like 
that. And you, if you were with a teacher, have the good grace to 
say so up front next time.
data.name: Policeman
data.processed:
<story>...Then it's fine. Though you shouldn't leave a minor alone like 
<story>that. And you, if you were with a teacher, have the good grace to 
<story>say so up front next time.

data.text:
I managed to bring Air Shakur, free from police custody, back to 
the dorms. She didn't say a thing on the way back, but...

choices.text: Don't stay out too late, OK?
Don't stay out too late, OK?

data.processed:
<story>I managed to bring Air Shakur, free from police custody, back to 
<story>the dorms. She didn't say a thing on the way back, but...

data.text:
You're just gonna let me go like that? Me, the notorious 
delinquent, staying out all night right up 'till curfew? Most 
people'd be suspicious.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You're just gonna let me go like that? Me, the notorious 
<story>delinquent, staying out all night right up 'till curfew? Most 
<story>people'd be suspicious.

data.text:
Oh, maybe you just wanted to stop me before I dragged you into 
deep shit? Yeah, now that, I can understand.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: You were doing something important, right?
You were doing something important, right?

data.processed:
<story>Oh, maybe you just wanted to stop me before I dragged you into 
<story>deep shit? Yeah, now that, I can understand.

data.text: ...Huh?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: You take things seriously... I think.
You take things seriously... I think.

data.processed: <story>...Huh?

data.text:
I thought back to her burning gaze that morning. 
I could never suspect a girl who was contemplating something so 
intensely.
data.processed:
<story>I thought back to her burning gaze that morning. 
<story>I could never suspect a girl who was contemplating something so 
<story>intensely.

data.text:
Plus, to do that something important of hers, it only made sense 
that she'd need a comfortable place to focus.
data.processed:
<story>Plus, to do that something important of hers, it only made sense 
<story>that she'd need a comfortable place to focus.

data.text:
You're not gonna ask questions 'cuz you think I “take things 
seriously”? You're acting on unsourced assumptions 
...Same as that cop.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You're not gonna ask questions 'cuz you think I “take things 
<story>seriously”? You're acting on unsourced assumptions 
<story>...Same as that cop.

data.text:
In the end people only see what they wanna see. Human desires 
corrupt their judgements. ...And it drives them crazy. You can't 
trust crazy. ...That's what makes my "partner" a real one.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>In the end people only see what they wanna see. Human desires 
<story>corrupt their judgements. ...And it drives them crazy. You can't 
<story>trust crazy. ...That's what makes my "partner" a real one.

data.text:
...gh. ...I mean my PC. It's more than just some box of metal. It 
can answer any question you throw at it. It's a complete 
intelligence in itself.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...gh. ...I mean my PC. It's more than just some box of metal. It 
<story>can answer any question you throw at it. It's a complete 
<story>intelligence in itself.

data.text:
It can take its enormous dataset to optimize training, devise a 
strategy to win any mock race... It can find the solution for any 
problem you throw at it.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>It can take its enormous dataset to optimize training, devise a 
<story>strategy to win any mock race... It can find the solution for any 
<story>problem you throw at it.

data.text:
Give it valid input, and it'll find the right answer, guaranteed. 
Just one answer, every indeterminate nuance accounted for and 
excised.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Give it valid input, and it'll find the right answer, guaranteed. 
<story>Just one answer, every indeterminate nuance accounted for and 
<story>excised.

data.text: If it looks like there's something it can't answer, that's on the user. But I'm different. So it always gives me that one answer.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: You really trust that partner of yours.
You really trust that partner of yours.

data.processed: If it looks like there's something it can't answer, that's on the user. But I'm different. So it always gives me that one answer.

data.text: ...Well, no shit. I'm the one who made it.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Well, no shit. I'm the one who made it.

data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Oh.

data.text: ...Gross.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Gross.

data.text:
Seemed like I upset her again... 
Turning over our conversation in my mind, I headed back to my 
room.
data.processed:
<story>Seemed like I upset her again... 
<story>Turning over our conversation in my mind, I headed back to my 
<story>room.

data.text:
Ah! Shakur-san, welcome back! 
I, uh, er, I...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Ah! Shakur-san, welcome back! 
<story>I, uh, er, I...!

data.text:
...I was just sorting out some data.
Easier to focus out there than in here.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...I was just sorting out some data.
<story>Easier to focus out there than in here.

data.text:
Wait, we've been over this. Don't stay up for my sake. If I go out, 
it's not your―― ...Never mind. Go to bed. Gotta be up early 
tomorrow, yeah?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Wait, we've been over this. Don't stay up for my sake. If I go out, 
<story>it's not your―― ...Never mind. Go to bed. Gotta be up early 
<story>tomorrow, yeah?

data.text:
Right～... Oh, that reminds me... Shakur-san, you found a trainer 
for tomorrow, didn't you...?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Right～... Oh, that reminds me... Shakur-san, you found a trainer 
<story>for tomorrow, didn't you...?

data.text:
Yeah, said he wanted to see what I could do. I'll play along, but I 
bet it'll end up with "the usual result". 
Don't need to run a simulation to know that.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, said he wanted to see what I could do. I'll play along, but I 
<story>bet it'll end up with "the usual result". 
<story>Don't need to run a simulation to know that.

data.text:
Ain't your problem, anyway.
Lights out.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Ain't your problem, anyway.
<story>Lights out.

data.text:
――Knew it, same answer as always. 
Hey, 『Parcae』...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>――Knew it, same answer as always. 
<story>Hey, 『Parcae』...

data.text:
(『Parcae』―― The partner I developed from the ground up, 
OS to user program, in anticipation of joining the Twinkle 
Series.)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(『Parcae』―― The partner I developed from the ground up, 
<story>OS to user program, in anticipation of joining the Twinkle 
<story>Series.)

data.text:
(The optimal debut race 『Parcae』 scheduled is coming up. 
Physically speaking, I meet the all the parameters, as expected, 
but...)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(The optimal debut race 『Parcae』 scheduled is coming up. 
<story>Physically speaking, I meet the all the parameters, as expected, 
<story>but...)

data.text:
(“That” value hasn't changed. Of course it hasn't. Code doesn't 
lie. That solution is immutable.)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(“That” value hasn't changed. Of course it hasn't. Code doesn't 
<story>lie. That solution is immutable.)

data.text:
(So why am I still searching? Still struggling? Still thinking? 
Why...)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(So why am I still searching? Still struggling? Still thinking? 
<story>Why...)
